title: Manzanar National Historic Site: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us      The Federal Government has an official job website. Manzanar, and all National Park sites, are required by law to post all permanent, term, and seasonal job announcements on this website.www.usajobs.opm.gov  Â    Current positions at Manzanar National Historic Site Manzanar National Historic Site Recruiting Youth Conservation Corps Members for summer 2016 Manzanar National Historic Site will sponsor an 8-week long Youth Conservation Corps program this summer. Youths 15 to 18 are encouraged to apply.
